results.definition: have a strong desire or urge to do something
examples: She is itching to start the project

results.definition: an irritating cutaneous sensation that produces a desire to scratch
a contagious skin infection caused by the itch mite; characterized by persistent itching and skin irritation
examples: he has a bad case of the itch

results.definition: scrape or rub as if to relieve itching

examples: I'm itching--the air is so dry!
